short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI app that scans sites, content, numbers, and urls for fraud including crypto scams, pig butchering, phishing, fake brand sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SCRAM! is a scam and fraud detection browser extension. It helps you to identify scams using machine learning. After install, pin the SCRAM! blue shield extension to your tool bar. When you encounter text, image, phone numbers, or website URLs you're not sure about, click the SCRAM! shield and we'll give you our trained AI response to help you determine if it could be a scam. 

SCRAM! will automatically display a message if you visit a site that we think is fraudulent. You can disable this feature when you launch the extension in your browser.

Our AI has been trained to spot phishing, crypto scams, pig butchering, imposter call center phone numbers, and malicious URLs.  AI isn't perfect, if you think we got something wrong, please give us feedback and we'll fix it!

A NOTE ABOUT PRIVACY:   In order to detect fraud and scam, this extension needs extended permissions to inspect content and to show a warning message in your browser.  This inspection is performed over encrypted channels (API) to our machine learning software. Our service does not store, or inspect, or share any of your browser activity.
